name: Tetris Effect: Connected
additional_info: Affects only Journey and Effect modes; affects only gameplay (not menus). Does not affect when playing in docked mode. (introduced in version 2.0)
instructions: Options ↦ Gameplay ↦ Vertical Mode

name: Nitro Ball
additional_info: It supports only the FlipGrip-inverse vertical orientation. You can put your Switch into the FlipGrip up side down and it works fine, just the latch does not hold it in place, so take care.
instructions: There is a Rotate Screen option right in the main menu, and also in the game pause menu.

name: Eschatos
additional_info: It supports all four orientations. The game also includes Judgement Silversword and Cardinal Sins.
instructions: Press + to cycles through orientations.

name: Sophstar
additional_info: It supports both FlipGrip and inverse TATE orientation. In TATE orientation in 100% zoom you want to offset the screen by 4 pixels to get the whole picture. This bug has been reported upstream.
instructions: Options > Video Options > Screen Orientation > Vertical I (TATE)

name: Moon Dancer
additional_info: Supports both FlipGrip and inverse TATE orientation.
instructions: Option > Rotation > Vertical-2

name: GROOVE COASTER WAI WAI PARTY!!!!
instructions: From the main menu, enter the configurations by selecting the Gear icon at the bottom. Press R until you get to the Screen tab, and set the Screen Direction to "Verical (Right)" and the Gameplay Aspect Ratio to "9:16"

name: Espgaluda II -Be Ascension. The Third Bright Stone of Birth-
instructions: OPTIONS > General Screen > Rotate > Right Roll and Link Rotation > ON

name: Mushihimesama
instructions: OPTIONS > General Screen > Rotate > Right Roll and Link Rotation > ON
